701000f-a.title: Bronx: Edison Avenue - Randall Avenue
701000f-a.text:
Edison Avenue, east sid:, between Randall and
Schley Avenues, showing the J. D. Tolfe Mansion.
The G. W. Bromley map of 1900 shows the house to
be located on the estate of deorge Bruce Brown.
June 1926.
00Brown Jrothers
